api_list.name: Collection List
api_list.description: Get the list of all collections
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kvstore.p.rapidapi.com/collections"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kvstore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Collection info
Get items
api_list.description: Get <key,value> pairs ordered by DESC creation time

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of items to be returned (max. 100)

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: the sort type (asc = ascending, desc = descending)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: This parameter is used to skip items from the result. An item is returned if created_at < offset (descending order) or created_at > offset (ascending order)

api_list.name: Get storage info
api_list.description: Show the user's storage status and information
